name: Bodybuilding
description: Bodybuilding is a form of physical exercise and body modification involving intensive muscle hypertrophy.

name: Cardiovascular Training
description: Cardiovascular training, commonly referred to as cardio, is any exercise that increases the heart rate and improves.

name: Yoga and Flexibility
description: Yoga is a holistic practice that combines physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation to promote overall well-being.

name: Weightlifting
description: Weightlifting is a strength training activity that involves lifting weights to build muscle mass and increase strength.

name: Pilates
description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method designed to strengthen muscles, improve flexibility, and enhance posture.

name: Spinning
description: Spinning, also known as indoor cycling, is a high-intensity cardio workout performed on stationary bikes.
